text: Phyllida Ann Law (born 8 May 1932) is a Scottish actress. Her movie credits include Peter's Friends (1992), Much Ado About Nothing (1993), Emma (1996), The Winter Guest (1997) and Nanny McPhee (2005). Law was born in Glasgow. She was married to actor Eric Thompson from 1957 until his death in 1982. Their daughters, Emma and Sophie Thompson, are both actresses. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Glasgow Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire Category:Radio actors Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish voice actors
title: Phyllida Law
